name: Santa Miracle Demo
description:
• As Christmas approaches, Santa needs your help to ensure that all the gifts are delivered on time! In this festive game, you'll take control of Santa and use his magical powers to race across the globe, delivering presents to children along the way. With smooth controls and a variety of challenges to overcome, this game is a joy to play for people of all ages. Can you help Santa spread holiday cheer to every corner of the world?

Instructions

Santa isn't allowed to touch the ground to prevent him from being spotted. 

UI

Health - Santa will have health that will drop if he hits an obstacle but the ground will instantly end his trip. 

Miracle - this tracks the number of miracles you gain from dropping gifts at houses or shelters.  

  • Miracles can be used to collect certain miracle orbs in the level to increase  Santa's magic for a short time. 

Next gift UI: This will display the upcoming gift that you are about to drop from your bag. 

Input

Santa leap - Press space to use Santa's leap in order to keep the pace moving and keep yourself off the ground. 

Drop Gift - Pressing the A input will enable Santa to drop a gift from his magical bag. 

  • Gifts can be dropped at houses or shelters to increase miracles. Dropping the preferred gift-color will increase the miracle gain.
